neutral: Alt-Fire: Charge toward your enemies and remove debuffs. Gain a critical melee strike after impacting an enemy at distance.
changes: Melee damage boost after shield bash is based on amount of charge consumed. Now provides mini-crit at 25% depleted
and full crit at 60% depleted.
Charging now removes debuffs from the Demoknight
Reduced blast resistance from 40% to 30%.
Removed fire immunity.

[Undocumented] The charge meter can now be refilled by resupply cabinets.
